Title: Provides that all employees of the department of correctional services have a duty to report any sexual conduct between an employee and an inmate
Summary: Provides that all employees of the department of correctional services have a duty to report any sexual conduct between an employee and an inmate; provides that employees that fail to report shall be subject to disciplinary action.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the duty to report sexual conduct by an employee with an inmate
